data.description: Determines events severity (as determined from external source). Runs reputation check if high severity, runs quick check if not.

cells.block_code:
def on_start(container):
    phantom.debug('on_start() called')
    
    # call 'decision_1' block
    decision_1(container=container)

    return
cells.title: START

cells.block_code:
def on_finish(container, summary):
    phantom.debug('on_finish() called')
    # This function is called after all actions are completed.
    # summary of all the action and/or all details of actions
    # can be collected here.

    # summary_json = phantom.get_summary()
    # if 'result' in summary_json:
        # for action_result in summary_json['result']:
            # if 'action_run_id' in action_result:
                # action_results = phantom.get_action_results(action_run_id=action_result['action_run_id'], result_data=False, flatten=False)
                # phantom.debug(action_results)

cells.title: END

cells.block_code:
def decision_1(action=None, success=None, container=None, results=None, handle=None, filtered_artifacts=None, filtered_results=None, custom_function=None, **kwargs):
    phantom.debug('decision_1() called')
    
    severity_param = container.get('severity', None)

    # check for 'if' condition 1
    matched = phantom.decision(
        container=container,
        conditions=[
            [severity_param, "==", "high"],
        ])

    # call connected blocks if condition 1 matched
    if matched:
        ip_reputation_1(action=action, success=success, container=container, results=results, handle=handle, custom_function=custom_function)
        return

    # call connected blocks for 'else' condition 2
    lookup_ip_1(action=action, success=success, container=container, results=results, handle=handle, custom_function=custom_function)

    return
cells.name: decision
